items.text: well outside off, Mithun waits and then sticks his bat out to help it to third man
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: 121kmh, pretty innocuous outside off, pushed down to mid off again
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: 119kmh, touch shorter with some away movement on off stump, he defends it off the back foot
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.preText: Not sure why Williamson didn't bring on Ferguson with Bangladesh in this position. But here he is now with a slip an lot of pace
items.text: from well wide of the crease and angling in sharply towards middle and leg, Mithun brings his bat down just in time to defend
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: There's a leg gully in place
items.text: similar release point but it's outside off now, he leans forward a bit and pushes it on off
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short ball this time outside off, Mithun hangs back and keeps the ball down for a single to third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: pushes at the short of length ball away from his body outside off, inside edge beats leg gully for one
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: angling in sharply towards the batsman, he works it behind square in the vacant area for two
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: beats the outside edge! That was 150kmh, that was on length, that was something he wanted to defend but could not, Mithun
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length delivery on middle, he defends it back
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: bit of room outside off with some shape, he steers it to point
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.preText: Leebro: "So Ferguson has taken 9 wickets @ 31.55 so far this year with RPO of 6.17, hardly staggering numbers." We're only six weeks into the year, to be fair to him
items.text: closer to the off stump, Mahmudullah leans forward and blocks
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: more on the off stump, no room and he defends again
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: bit of room this time and he drives it nicely through the covers
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: too wide this time, poor line, he drives it nicely off the middle but straight to cover
items.postText:
Thanks, Vishal. Here is Lockie.

It's time for drinks and for Varun Shetty to take over. And I need to clean the coffee machine
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball pushed down leg side, can't get bat on that
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, 1 wide

items.text: short ad just outside off, jumps up to get on top of the bounce and punches to point
items.postText: SeanTheMexican: "@Varun, Is it the typical hard, "batsman's paradise" Napier pitch this time around?" --- Yeah certainly seems so.
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: just past square leg! Or did he get a finger on that? Santner flying to his right. Lockie's short one gets big on Mahmudullah who fends in front of his chest with a closed face and gets it aerailly down to fine leg. 147kph bouncer, that
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: 153kph and fizzing past the outside edge as he's late on the forward defence
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the back foot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: 149.2kph, short ball, too wide, easily left alone
items.postText: Hayden Campbell: "@Leebro. Who would you pick then? The flash Ferg offers a point of difference. Quite often bowlers from the other end benefit from his express pace.. Michael Mason use to nab a few wickets from the other end when Shane Bond was charging in."
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: steered nicely with the swing. Length and shaping away wide outside off. Reaches out and opens the face late to get this to sweeper's left
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: length and some curve away outside off. Opens the face on the front foot and gets it to third man
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: shot! Majestic. Length ball just outside off, skips down at it and stands tall as he punches this aerially between bowler and mid-off
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs
